com.example.team04adventure.Model

Class StorageManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.example.team04adventure.Model.StorageManager

  • public class StorageManager
extends java.lang.Object
    StorageManager is meant to write data into the SQLite database. This data is meant for access in offline mode in the case that the user chooses offline mode or to view stories that the user has cached in the device memory.
    Author:
    Team04Adventure

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      StorageManager(android.content.Context context)
      Constructor that also creates an instance of SQLiteHelper for easier DB access.
